home.title: Artyom Bordulanyuk (Tyomay) – Full-Stack Web Developer | React.js, Next.js, Node.js
home.description: Official website of Artyom Bordulanyuk (Tyomay) — Full-Stack Web Developer. Building scalable, SEO-optimized web apps with React, Next.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Docker.
home.keywords: Artyom Bordulanyuk, Tyomay, Артём Бордулянюк, Արտյոմ Բորդուլանյուկ, Full-Stack Web Developer, React, Next.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Docker, CI/CD, Freelance Developer, Scalable Web Apps

summary.intro: Experienced Full-Stack Developer with over 5 years of expertise in building robust, scalable, and high-performance web applications.
summary.specialization: Proficient in both frontend and backend development using React.js, Next.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL. I have strong experience with CI/CD automation, Docker-based deployment (including Swarm across multiple IPs), microservices architecture, and real-time communication systems.

experience.list1: Engineering fault-tolerant backend systems with Nginx and Docker Swarm across distributed IP servers
experience.list2: Building modern, responsive UIs using React.js, Material-UI, and Ant Design
experience.list3: Integrating secure payment systems (e.g., Stripe, PayPal) and automating PDF invoice generation
experience.list4: Designing and maintaining microservice infrastructures with Redis and RabbitMQ
experience.list5: Developing unit and integration tests with Jest and SuperTest to ensure code quality

summary.focus: I prioritize clean architecture, performance-oriented development, and scalable solutions that align with business growth.

details: Developed real-time dashboards with ReactJS, Redux, and Socket.io for data visualization and monitoring
Engineered scalable backend systems with Node.js, Docker, and Nginx, deploying across distributed IP servers
Automated CI/CD pipelines via Jenkins with rollback and recovery strategies
Integrated Stripe, PayPal payments and generated PDF receipts using Puppeteer and webhooks
Improved test coverage by 40% through comprehensive unit and integration testing (Jest, SuperTest)
Optimized frontend performance through asset optimization and lazy loading techniques
Built a custom CRM platform using Node.js, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, and React
Created reusable UI components with Ant Design and Bootstrap
Designed REST APIs with efficient data indexing and migration support
Maintained end-to-end testing strategy with Jest and SuperTest
Managed CI/CD deployments with Docker-based infrastructure
Built internal admin dashboards with React, ExpressJS, and MongoDB
Implemented real-time features using Socket.io
Developed RESTful API services and backend logic using Node.js
Refactored legacy codebases using modern React architecture
Designed adaptive UIs using Material-UI, SCSS, and EJS
Ensured accessibility and cross-browser compatibility
Worked collaboratively with backend developers to integrate API data
Conducted structured training sessions on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React for aspiring developers
Developed practical learning projects and provided personalized mentorship to junior developers

callToAction.title: Let’s Build the Future Together
callToAction.subtitle: Have a project in mind or need a reliable developer to bring your ideas to life? Let's connect and build something impactful, scalable, and truly user-focused.
callToAction.hint: Or scroll back up to get in touch

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.philosophy: I believe that great digital products combine thoughtful design, clean architecture, and purposeful code. Every project I take on is guided by clarity, collaboration, and the drive to create lasting value.
faqSection.moreA11yHint: Expand to show more frequently asked questions

faqs.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
faqs.answer: I specialize in modern web technologies including React.js, Next.js, Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Docker. I'm also experienced with CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins), cloud platforms (AWS, Vercel), and scalable architecture patterns like microservices.

faqs.question: How do you approach new projects?
faqs.answer: I begin with discovery—understanding your goals, users, and pain points. Then I define a clear roadmap, propose suitable technologies, and begin development with iterative updates and feedback sessions to ensure alignment at every step.

faqs.question: What’s your typical project timeline?
faqs.answer: It depends on the project scope. Simple landing pages can be delivered in 1–2 weeks. Full-stack platforms usually range from 1 to 3 months. I always define realistic milestones and keep communication open to adapt to your timeline and feedback.

faqs.question: Do you offer long-term support?
faqs.answer: Yes. I provide ongoing support for bug fixes, feature enhancements, performance optimization, and security monitoring. You can count on me as a reliable technical partner even after launch.

faqs.question: How do you ensure high code quality?
faqs.answer: I follow best engineering practices: modular architecture, unit/integration tests (Jest, SuperTest), code reviews, and clear documentation. I also use tools like ESLint, Prettier, and CI pipelines to maintain quality throughout the project.

faqs.question: Can you collaborate with our existing team?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. I’ve worked with startups and enterprises, adapting to different tools, workflows, and agile practices. Whether you need full-cycle development or extra hands in your sprint, I integrate smoothly with your in-house team.

faqs.question: Do you handle SEO and performance optimization?
faqs.answer: Yes. I implement SEO best practices (meta tags, Open Graph, structured data, sitemap, robots.txt) and optimize Core Web Vitals (LCP, CLS, INP) to ensure fast loading and high Lighthouse scores.

faqs.question: What determines the cost of a project?
faqs.answer: Pricing depends on project complexity, design requirements, integrations, and support needs. I offer both hourly and fixed-price models, always providing a clear estimate before starting.

faqs.question: Can we sign an NDA or formal contract?
faqs.answer: Of course. I often work under NDA and provide contracts for security and clarity. Your intellectual property and business data are fully protected.

faqs.question: How do you communicate during the project?
faqs.answer: I adapt to your preferred channels (Slack, Telegram, WhatsApp, Email). I provide weekly demos, task tracking via Jira/Trello, and accommodate time zones to keep collaboration smooth.

faqs.question: Do you handle deployment and DevOps setup?
faqs.answer: Yes. I prepare Docker containers, configure Nginx/PM2, set up HTTPS certificates, and build CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions) for automated and reliable deployments.

faqs.question: Do you offer scaling and post-launch growth support?
faqs.answer: Yes. I help optimize database performance, implement caching/CDN, integrate analytics, and prepare your platform for increasing traffic and new features.

faqs.question: What about security and maintenance?
faqs.answer: I monitor for vulnerabilities, apply security patches, update dependencies, and set up backups. This ensures your system remains stable and secure long-term.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: I work via Upwork, direct contracts, or invoices. Both hourly and fixed-price models are available, depending on what works best for you.
